column1: Leadership in Health and Social Care MSc
column3: College of Health, Psychology and Social Care
column5: This postgraduate programme offers a flexible master's degree for those working, or interested in working, within Health and Social Care who want to increase their leadership skills and create a pathway of learning which is bespoke to their individual workplace needs. Modules can be studied in a range of modes including on campus, blended, online and distance learning.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
column9: 1 year full time, up to 6 years part time
